headline: Microchip price target raised to $78 from $72 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on Microchip (MCHP) to $78 from $72 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm raised price targets for most of its diversified analog semi stock coverage, noting that it expects modest calendar Q4 beats and Q1 raises across the board led by industrial semis given ongoing rebounds across most subsegments, favorable pricing, and robust growth in strategic AI businesses.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing too
